Title: Sparks of Life: Ohn'ahran Plains
Description:
The Ohn'ahran Plains are overflowing with energy, $n, and the lands teem with beasts.

Now is the time to join in the hunt, to revel in the bounty, and earn glory for yourself.
ObjectivesText: Collect 100 Sparks of Life in the Ohn'ahran Plains, while in War Mode.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Fieldmaster Emberath in Valdrakken.
